member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Scripting.CSharp.CSharpScript

member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Scripting.CSharp.CSharpScript.RunAsync``1(System.String,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Scripting.ScriptOptions,System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: The source code of the script.
The script options.
An object instance whose members can be accessed by the script as global variables, or a instance that was the output from a previously run script.
